title: Country of Islam
creator_credit: Gunther V. Fritsch and Churchill-Wexler Film Productions
brief_description: Provides a glimpse of the culture, economy and religion of Morocco as seen through the eyes of Mustafa, a Moslem boy who leaves his village home and journeys to a city to seek an education.
